p: Enzyme inhibition assay showed that the latex possessed an inhibitory effect on sucrase, maltase and α-amylase enzymes ( Figure 3). Even though all enzymes were inhibited by the latex, greater inhibition was shown on sucrase (IC 50 = 2.92 μg/ml) than maltase (IC 50 = 11.81 μg/ml) and α-amylase (IC 50 = 14.92 μg/ml) enzymes. The finding of the study showed that sucrase, maltase, and α-amylase inhibition capacity of the latex was concentration dependent. Percentage inhibition of the latex was significant ( p < 0.001) compared to vehicle control.
